ygData.subject: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, There is a new survey for the EQFenninRo community. For people who play short characters, it is a known problem that the ferry ride from Freeport to
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

There is a new survey for the EQFenninRo community.

For people who play short characters, it is a known problem that the ferry ride from Freeport to Butcherblock is hard to jump for short characters, I hope the GMs fix this soon, for this survey, the question is: How many times did it take you to jump onto the ferry without falling into the water and waiting another 40 mins?

----

Possible answers are:

o Once
o Twice
o Trice
o Four times
o Five times or more (poor guy)


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://www.onelist.com/surveycenter/EQFenninRo


Thanks!

EQFenninRo Owner
